title: PulseFire Ezreal Q sound is missing
body: There's no audo for when Mystic Shot is fired. Just makes sounds on hits.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! This will be fixed with patch 7.12. Lemme know if you're still having issues with this once 7.12 goes live. :)
Hey! The sound is still missing :(
Looks like you'd posted this ~22 hours ago, and the new patch may not have been out yet. Would you mind taking another listen, everything should be rolled out now!
